name: Leviathan: Marauder (Demo)
description:
After the god of chaos known as the "Leviathan" nearly destroyed the world, Turiel is left attempting to rebuild itself. In a now corrupted world, factions have formed, further dividing civilization. 

Some factions have sworn to protect the innocent people of Turiel, while others have a more malicious agenda.

Take control of a member of the Slayer covenant named Marie, as she hunts down the man responsible for killing most of the people she cared about. 

During your journey, you will encounter androids, demons, gods, and family. 

In this twisted new world, how could you possibly rise up and make things right again?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks: Celine and Kagachi377!!!
